Snare Setter: Skill Trained (Crafting)
Cavernstalker Kobold: Can Climb at 7' on a success, or 15' on a critical success/Successes on Acrobatics to Squeeze are critical successes
Dragon's Presence: +1 Intimidation to Demoralize a foe of equal or lesser level
Quick Coercion: Can Coerce in 1 rd
Snare Genius: Can Craft snares in 3 actions instead of 1 min and prepare 3 snares for quick deployment during daily prep/Snares inflict off-guard for 1 rd on critical failure
Snare Setter: Has access to uncommon kobold snares
Vicious Snares: Snakes inflict +1d6 precision
Winglets: Gains +5' horizontal Leap and 10' Long Jump distances and can High Jump and Long Jump without a Stride
Combat
Hit Points: 20 Armor Class: 19 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Half Plate Shield: None Weapons: Composite Shortbow (+8 1d6+1 P [Crit +d10] R60'; dexterity; expert); Gauntlet (+7 1d4+2 B; strength; expert); Greatclub (+7 1d10+2 B; strength; expert); Jaws (+10 1d6+2 P; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Dragonscaled Kobold: +4 Hit Points
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strongjaw Kobold: Jaws inflict 1d6 HP piercing
Benefactor's Majesty: (1) Gives self 1 temporary Hit Points for 1 min and a flat check to remove persistent damage, and requires foes to make a DC 11 flat check to attack self for 1 rd
Between The Scales: Agile and finesse melee weapons and unarmed attacks vs. an off-guard creature have the backstabber trait
Briar Battler: Can Take Cover in any environmental difficult terrain
Close Quarters: Can end movement in the same square as a Small or smaller ally
Cringe: (R) Lowers the damage of a foe's critical hit by 3 once per foe per day
Fleeing Shriek: (2) 10' emanation inflicts -1d6 HP sonic (save basic Fortitude), and a subsequent Stride triggers no reactions from any creature that failed to save, once per hour
Grovel: (1) Makes a Feint vs. Will against a foe within 30' to reduce its threat perception
Kobold Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon kobold weapons
Kobold Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Kobold Weapons; Greatpick; Light Pick; Pick)
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Scamper: (1) Strides up to 20' feet away from a foe, gaining +2 Armor Class against triggered reactions
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Sudden Charge: (2) Makes a melee Strike after a double Stride
Tumbling Diversion: (1) Successful Tumble Through a foe's space allows subsequent +1 Create A Diversion attempt, or +2 on a critical success to make self hidden to that foe
Venomtail Kobold: Can enhance a piercing or slashing weapon to inflict 1 HP persistent poison on next hit before the end of the next turn once per day
Save: Fortitude: +5 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Ally's Shelter: (R) Uses an adjacent ally's modifier for the triggering save once per day
Dragon's Presence: Successes vs. fear are critical successes, and failures vs. fear are critical failures
Dragonscaled Kobold: +1 vs. dragon breath, sleep, and paralysis
Elementheart Kobold: +1 vs. choice of cold, electricity, fire, sonic, acid, or poison
Magic
Attack: Arcane Innate: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 15 (charisma; trained)
Magic Notes:
Evolved Spellhorn: Can cast a chosen 1st-rank and a chosen 2nd-rank arcane spell as arcane innate spells once each per day
Resplendent Spellhorn: Can cast a chosen 3rd-rank and a chosen 4th-rank arcane spell as arcane innate spells once each per day
Spellhorn Kobold: Can cast a chosen cantrip as an arcane innate spell at will
